pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 9 from Sophisticated Engineering.

content.raw:
This needs to be populated with more information i.e. : 

‌

```
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<model>
  <name>X4 Config 6</name>
  <version>1.0</version>
  <sdf version="1.6">model.sdf</sdf>

  <author>
    <name>name</name>
    <email>email@email.com</email>
  </author>

  <description>
    X4 UAV with sensor configuration #6: VGA RGBD camera, IMU, pressure sensor, magnetometer, ceiling point sensor, floor point sensor.
  </description>
</model>
```

‌

This needs to be populated with more information i.e. :

<?xml version="1.0"?>

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 9 from Sophisticated Engineering.
Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 9 from Sophisticated Engineering.

content.raw:
I just went through your submission and everything looks good with the exception of one request and one issue:

**Request:**

Can you please submit a comparison of the lighting and camera coverage on `X4C5` vs your changes on this `X4C9` in image form? Side-by-side comparison of the camera view in the starting area from RViz would be sufficient.

If the difference is apparent in the screenshots \(as claimed\), the value added by this model submission will be apparent.

**Issue:**

Please work with your `urdf` file to ensure visualization is functional in RViz or re-use the default one from `x4_description` as a worse-case scenario.  I encountered some issues with visualization when attempting to visualize the model using `robot_description` in RViz.

‌

P.S. please update your PR to merge onto `urban_circuit` as opposed to `default`.
content.html:
I just went through your submission and everything looks good with the exception of one request and one issue:

Request:

Can you please submit a comparison of the lighting and camera coverage on X4C5 vs your changes on this X4C9 in image form? Side-by-side comparison of the camera view in the starting area from RViz would be sufficient.

If the difference is apparent in the screenshots (as claimed), the value added by this model submission will be apparent.

Issue:

Please work with your urdf file to ensure visualization is functional in RViz or re-use the default one from x4_description as a worse-case scenario. I encountered some issues with visualization when attempting to visualize the model using robot_description in RViz.

‌

P.S. please update your PR to merge onto urban_circuit as opposed to default.

pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 9 from Sophisticated Engineering.
Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 9 from Sophisticated Engineering.
Model submission for X4 sensor configuration 9 from Sophisticated Engineering.

content.raw:
This looks good. I have a few changes I'd like you to make. Instead of listing them, I made a diff:

The main things are:

* Add a gas sensor to model.sdf
* Update lights to cast shadows and propellers not to cast shadows.

```
#!diff
diff --git a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb
--- a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb
+++ b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb
@@ -16,4 +16,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       <!-- Publish robot state information -->
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-pose-publisher-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::PosePublisher\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-pose-publisher-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::PosePublisher">
         <publish_link_pose>true</publish_link_pose>
@@ -24,4 +24,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -43,4 +43,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -62,4 +62,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -81,4 +81,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -100,4 +100,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -119,4 +119,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -140,4 +140,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       <!-- Battery plugin -->
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-linearbatteryplugin-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::LinearBatteryPlugin\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-linearbatteryplugin-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::LinearBatteryPlugin">
         <battery_name>linear_battery</battery_name>
@@ -154,2 +154,9 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
 
+    <!-- Gas Sensor plugin -->
+    <plugin filename="libGasEmitterDetectorPlugin.so"
+      name="subt::GasDetector">
+      <topic>/model/#{_name}/gas_detected</topic>
+      <update_rate>10</update_rate>
+      <type>gas</type>
+    </plugin>
 
diff --git a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf
--- a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf
+++ b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf
@@ -1,1 +1,2 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
 <sdf version="1.6">
@@ -105,2 +106,3 @@
               <direction>0 0 -1</direction>
+              <cast_shadows>1</cast_shadows>
             </light>
@@ -122,2 +124,3 @@
               <direction>0 0 -1</direction>
+              <cast_shadows>1</cast_shadows>
             </light>
@@ -139,2 +142,3 @@
               <direction>0 0 -1</direction>
+              <cast_shadows>1</cast_shadows>
             </light>
@@ -388,2 +392,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>1 0 0 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -393,2 +398,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -453,2 +459,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -458,2 +465,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -518,2 +526,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -523,2 +532,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -583,2 +593,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -588,2 +599,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -648,2 +660,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -653,2 +666,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -713,2 +727,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>1 0 0 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -718,2 +733,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>

```
content.html:
This looks good. I have a few changes I'd like you to make. Instead of listing them, I made a diff:

The main things are:

  • Add a gas sensor to model.sdf
  • Update lights to cast shadows and propellers not to cast shadows.
diff --git a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb
--- a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb
+++ b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/launch/spawner.rb
@@ -16,4 +16,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       <!-- Publish robot state information -->
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-pose-publisher-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::PosePublisher\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-pose-publisher-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::PosePublisher">
         <publish_link_pose>true</publish_link_pose>
@@ -24,4 +24,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -43,4 +43,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -62,4 +62,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -81,4 +81,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -100,4 +100,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -119,4 +119,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       </plugin>
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-multicopter-motor-model-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
         <robotNamespace>model/#{_name}</robotNamespace>
@@ -140,4 +140,4 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName
       <!-- Battery plugin -->
-      <plugin filename=\"libignition-gazebo-linearbatteryplugin-system.so\"
-        name=\"ignition::gazebo::systems::LinearBatteryPlugin\">
+      <plugin filename="libignition-gazebo-linearbatteryplugin-system.so"
+        name="ignition::gazebo::systems::LinearBatteryPlugin">
         <battery_name>linear_battery</battery_name>
@@ -154,2 +154,9 @@ def spawner(_name, _modelURI, _worldName

+    <!-- Gas Sensor plugin -->
+    <plugin filename="libGasEmitterDetectorPlugin.so"
+      name="subt::GasDetector">
+      <topic>/model/#{_name}/gas_detected</topic>
+      <update_rate>10</update_rate>
+      <type>gas</type>
+    </plugin>

diff --git a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf
--- a/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf
+++ b/submitted_models/sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_9/model.sdf
@@ -1,1 +1,2 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
 <sdf version="1.6">
@@ -105,2 +106,3 @@
               <direction>0 0 -1</direction>
+              <cast_shadows>1</cast_shadows>
             </light>
@@ -122,2 +124,3 @@
               <direction>0 0 -1</direction>
+              <cast_shadows>1</cast_shadows>
             </light>
@@ -139,2 +142,3 @@

+              <cast_shadows>1</cast_shadows>
             </light>
@@ -388,2 +392,3 @@

+                    <diffuse>1 0 0 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -393,2 +398,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -453,2 +459,3 @@

+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -458,2 +465,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -518,2 +526,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -523,2 +532,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -583,2 +593,3 @@
                 <material>
+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -588,2 +599,3 @@
                 </material>
+                <cast_shadows>0</cast_shadows>
             </visual>
@@ -648,2 +660,3 @@

+                    <diffuse>0 0 1 1</diffuse>
                     <script>
@@ -653,2 +666,3 @@
